title: BUG SPLAT ERROR PATCH 6.21
body:
Hello fellow League players,
Since the newest patch came out i haven't been able to play a single game without getting the BugSplat error on my own computer.
However, I recently used my account on my brothers computer and it was completely fine. Windows is up to date, i've re-installed LoL 6 times already, and currently running out of options.
Please help?

replies.body:
Bugsplat errors usually happen after a poor driver interaction or issues with your hardware occur. I strongly recommend working through our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it commonly resolves these types of issues.

Let me know if you encounter further bugsplats after working through that guide.

i did all the things on, the list, repaired my client, uninstall then re install ,, pdated all my drivers, directx etc still have issues since the patch 6.21 i think it's a bug in the game code you need to fix fast
Having the same issue. Literally can't play any games since 6.21, and it says ALL my drivers are up to date.
I'm also encountering the same problem. Doing everything on the guide did not fix the problem. I have no issues on another computer, it's only my laptop.

Since you're still having issues, we'll need to take a look at your system logs to find what's causing this to happen. I recommend grabbing those logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) request.

Let me know if you have any issues with those steps.
same here cant play as of yesterday :(

Hi,
same problem here. Since the new patch 6.21, I could not play any game. I did the same as DanaIieth did, but can't fix the bug. Each time League of Legends starts the loading screen my game crash and I can't reconnect any more into the game. Hopefully you will fix the bug as fast as you can.
